title: Multiple Region Change Passes
body:
I travel frequently due to flexibility with work and am often away from my main server location for months at a time. The costs add up to keep transferring one account, and grinding new levels in each region is tricky as a casual player, especially as I'm not sure whether I'll return to that region in the foreseeable future or not. I also tried another MOBA game where you're not tied to a region, but wasn't into it.

I messaged support and they confirmed that the cost of switching is quite high to "avoid abuse" of the system, and that nothing exists to get discounted transfers. I'm not sure what part of the system users could abuse with a discounted multiple switch pass, other than gaining region-exclusive discounts.
I would imagine that only people who are in a similar situation as me would fork out 5000+ RP in one go for future transfers, the price might be too high for one trying to abuse the system to reap benefits.

Just wanted to get other people's thoughts on the matter as I couldn't find a similar thread with the keywords I tried.

replies.body: The games aren't particularly fun during the levelling up stage so it's not a preference. Also if I'm going to spend the RP anyway, a transfer is more valuable than XP boosts or champions.

i mean. just level up new accounts on different servers... it only takes like 6-7 weeks playing 1-2 games a day to get an account to level 30.

instead of spening RP on transfers you can spend money on XP boosts and Champions you want to unlock.
